about_the_game:
You must stay alive in this horror endless school. Try to find the correct way to survive the anomalies in the endless school. Use your brain to escape from some extremely powerful anomalies bosses. Explore the story behinds this extremely powerful dimension... and don't die.

Welcome Back to School!

Turn back if you find any anomalies. You are waked in an endless school. You have to choose the way forward or backward. When you make the wrong decision, you will return to the origin.

The Uniques Anomalies

Anything can become an anomaly. Every chair around you, every set of stationery, even the blackboard or the classroom itself can become an anomaly you didn't expect. You might be scared to death by these anomalies or laugh to death from them.

The Abnormal Dimensions

Extremely abnormal anomalies are looking for you. Every time you pass the six normal levels, you'll be pulled into their dimension by some powerful anomaly. Each dimension has different game rules. You need to find these game rules and escape.

----------------------------------------------------------------

School 666 is a co-op horror game about finding anomalies.

In normal levels, players need to confirm whether there is any abnormality.

If there is an exception, go back along the way; if there is no exception, go forward.

In the Boss level, players need to find a way to escape according to the unique game rules of each level.

This game features more than 100 anomalies and more than 20 stages of abnormal dimensions.

This game pays tribute to many game and movie elements.

Sweet Baby Not Included.

----------------------------------------------------------------

If you need my permission to live stream this game, as long as you attach the game name(School 666) to the video introduction or stream description, you will automatically be authorized(including videos and live broadcasts used for profit).

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a finding anomalies horror game. Ghosts or monsters will appear and chase the player. Some jump scare will show up during the game. Some blood stains will appear in the game.

name: School 666

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX™ 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer games require an Internet connection.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX™ 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer games require an Internet connection.

short_description: School 666 is a 1-4 Player Co-op Survival Horror. You must escape this endless nightmare. Try to identify the correct path and survive the anomalies in this endless school. Some extremely powerful anomalies will catch you to their dimensions. Explore the reason why you are here... and don't die.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
